item.description:
Celebrate Charles Muir's Birthday with us and begin your New Year with a Tantric ritual of great power to manifest your heart’s desire!

This special Puja is designed to heal, awaken, and open your entire energy system, especially the heart chakra of your body. This ritual is profound, educational and great deal of fun. In a Puja you will stand in a circle with other people and practice many different meditations with those in the group. Through these exercises you will gain a deep understanding of Tantric principles and practices in a safe atmosphere to assist you in going deeper in your private relationships.

Charles Muir will be speaking about Tantra Yoga, an ancient spiritual system in which sexual love is considered a sacrament and the body the temple of the spirit. Of the hundreds of Yogic paths, it is the only one that gives an alternative to celibacy. It is a path for householders, where the two partners become One in an extended meditation wherein the entire body becomes an instrument of Love.

The goal of tantric practice is not better sex, it is about Union. It increases intimacy and connection, honoring the divine goddess in every woman, awakening and releasing female and male sexual energy to move up through you, not out of you. It is about aligning and awakening all of the chakras.

Charles is giving away your choice of one of two of his awesome CD’s, “Intro to Tantra Practices and Principles” or “Beyond Beginner’s Tantra”, a Tantra Birthday gift to everyone who attends! Plus, you can enter our drawing to win one of many educational Tantra products.

Please contact Kerry Churchill for more information about this Puja and We would love for you to invite your friends and family!! Normally $25, this event is now FREE; we welcome your love offering donations!

Our Beginners Weekend Seminars in the Santa Cruz Mountains of California are right around the corner, we want you there! Visit our website, call or email Kerry for everything you need to know!


  • Couples ~ February 27 – March 1, 2009
  • Singles ~ March 13 - 15, 2009



Phone: 831.566.2113 Email: santacruz@sourcetantra.com Website: www.sourcetantra.com
item.how_to_find_us: I will do my best to look like a goddess in honor of the birthday man!
item.name: Charles Muir’s Birthday Celebration and Tantra Puja Mixer!
